code: import React,{useState}from'react';import API from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:'',classYear:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await API.post('/users/register',formData);alert(response.data.message);}catch(error){console.error('Error registering user:',error);alert('Registration failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"classYear",placeholder:"Class Year",value:formData.classYear,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});}export default Register;
